headline: KPIT Technologies Ltd - 542651 - Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release

description: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from June 06, 2019, the equity shares of Mahesh Developers Ltd (Scrip Code: 542677) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of 'XT' Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no 20190603-40 dated June 03, 2019.

headline: Devika Proteins Ltd - 531171 - Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Director

description:
Ref: Scrip Code: 531171 (Devika Proteins Limited)

2) resignation letter dated 06th June, 2019 is received from Mr. Dhiren Kanaiyalal Thakkar (DIN: 00610001), resigning from the post of Director.

description: V R Films & Studios Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 10/06/2019 ,inter alia, to consider and approve The appointment of M/S Himank Desai & Co, chartered accountant as the Internal Auditor of the Company pursuant to Section 138 of the Companies Act, 2013 and other applicable provisions.
headline: V R Films & Studios Ltd - 542654 - Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting To Be Held On Monday, 10Th June, 2019

description: The Company had organized a conference call with the Investors / Analysts on Friday, 31st May, 2019 at 11:00 AM. A copy of transcript of conference call held with the Investors/ Analysts is enclosed herewith for your information and records.
